body:
Eleventy (or 11ty) is a Static Site Generator that aims to be a simpler alternative to Jekyl. It has been steadily gaining popularity in recent times, with 8.4K GitHub stars and 238 GitHub forks and growing!

It's completely open-source, written in JavaScript and unlike other SSG's (Gatsby, NuxtJS) it doesn't come bundled with a front-end library. Instead, it takes a series of templates, markdown files, and data and renders them as HTML to serve. It works with HTML, Markdown, Liquid, Nunjucks, Handlebars, Mustache, EJS, Haml, Pug, and JavaScript Template Literals. Find out more at the [official site](https://www.11ty.dev/)!

So without further ado, here are 50 Eleventy starter themes to kick off 2021!

## 1. Eleventyone

![Eleventyone 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/eleventyone-min.png)

A scaffold for a quick start building with the Eleventy SSG.

[See more details](https://github.com/philhawksworth/eleventyone)

## 2. **Smix Eleventy Starter**

![Smix 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/smix-eleventy-starter-min.png)

A starter kit for Eleventy v0.11.1 and Forestry CMS/Netlify. Based on gulp v4.

[See more details](https://github.com/hirusi/smix-eleventy-starter)

## 3. **tai11s**

![tai11s 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/tai11s-min.png)

An Eleventy starter with Tailwind CSS and PurgeCSS.

[See more details](https://github.com/danfascia/tai11s)

## 4. **11ty.js**

![11ty.js 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/eleventy-dot-js.png)

An Eleventy starter project using JavaScript templates.

[See more details](https://gitlab.com/reubenlillie/eleventy-dot-js-blog)

## 5. **pugsum**

![pugsum 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/pugsum-min.png)

An 11ty starter kit using Pug Templates and TailwindCSS.

[See more details](https://github.com/vktrwlt/pugsum)

## 6. **Industrial Empathy**

![Industrial Empathy 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/industrialempathy-min.png)

A high-performance blog template for the 11ty static site generator.

[See more details](https://github.com/google/eleventy-high-performance-blog)

## 7. **11ty Contentful Starter**

![Contentful Starter 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/11ty-contentful-starter.png)

A Contentful 11ty starter project.

[See more details](https://github.com/contentful/11ty-contentful-starter)

## 8. **Vredeburg**

![Vredeburg 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/vredeburg-min.png)

A simple starter project to create a blog using Eleventy and Tailwind CSS.

[See more details](https://github.com/dafiulh/vredeburg)

## 9. **Eleventy Duo**

![Eleventy Duo 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/eleventy-duo.png)

Eleventy Duo is a minimal and beautiful Eleventy theme for personal blogs.

[See more details](https://github.com/yinkakun/eleventy-duo)

## 10. **Neat Starter**

![Neat Starter 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/neat-starter-min.png)

Starter template for Netlify CMS, Eleventy, Alpine JS & Tailwind CSS.

[See more details](https://github.com/surjithctly/neat-starter)

## 11. **11r**

![11r 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/11r.png)

A blog template and theme using 11ty, TailwindCSS, Rollup, Prism syntax highlighting, etc.

[See more details](https://github.com/reeseschultz/11r)

## 12. **YAES**

![YAES 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/yaes-min.png)

Starter kit for your next eleventy(11ty) project using postcss, es6, snowpack, webpack.

[See more details](https://github.com/22mahmoud/YAES)

## 13. **Fundamenty**

![Fundamenty 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/fundamenty-min.png)

11ty Starter with Multi-language support, SEO-friendly, GitHub/GitLab Pages-ready.

[See more details](https://github.com/creasoft-dev/fundamenty)

## 14. **Eleventy Starter Boilerplate**

![Eleventy Starter Boilerplate 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/eleventy-starter-boilerplate-min.png)

Eleventy Starter Boilerplate is production-ready with SEO-friendly for quickly starting a blog.

[See more details](https://github.com/ixartz/Eleventy-Starter-Boilerplate) 
Check out [the demo](https://creativedesignsguru.com/demo/Nextjs-Blog-Boilerplate/)!

## 15. **Minimal 11ty Tailwind Starter**

![Minimal 11ty Tailwind Starter Theme](/images/uploads/minimal-11ty-tailwind-starter-min.png)

A very minimal eleventy starter using Tailwind CSS for styling. It features a smart navigation component that sets active states automatically.

[See more details](https://github.com/tomreinert/minimal-11ty-tailwind-starter)

## 16. **Dark Portfolio Theme for 11ty**

![Dark Portfolio Theme for 11ty](/images/uploads/dark-portfolio-template.png)

This is a port of the Dark Portfolio Template by W3C to 11ty!

[See more details](https://github.com/jmschrack/Dark-Portfolio-Template-11ty/)

## 17. **11tyFrame**

![11tyFrame Theme](/images/uploads/11tyframe.png)

A light site frame using Eleventy static site generator.

[See more details](https://github.com/octoxalis/11tyframe)

## 18. **Eleventy Hylia**

![Eleventy Hylia 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/hylia-min.png)

Hylia is a lightweight Eleventy starter kit to help you to create your own blog or personal website.

[See more details](https://github.com/andybelldesign/hylia)

## 19. **Eleventy Hylia Forestry**

![Eleventy Hylia Forestry 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/hylia-forestry-min.png)

Hylia is a lightweight Eleventy starter kit with Forestry CMS pre-configured, so that you can one-click install a progressive, accessible blog in minutes. It also gives you a well-organized starting point to extend it for yourself.

[See more details](https://github.com/DirtyF/hylia-forestry)

## 20. **Seven**

![Seven 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/seven-min.png)

An Eleventy template using Bootstrap, Sass, Webpack, Vue.js powered search, includes lots of other features.

[See more details](https://github.com/planetoftheweb/seven)

## 21. **Eleventy Starter Ghost**

![Eleventy Starter Ghost 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/eleventy-starter-ghost-min.png)

A starter template to build websites with Ghost & Eleventy.

[See more details](https://github.com/TryGhost/eleventy-starter-ghost)

## 22. **Eleventy Minimal Blog**

![Eleventy Minimal Blog 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/eleventy-blog-mnml.png)

A minimal blog template using eleventy.

[See more details](https://github.com/arpitbatra123/eleventy-blog-mnml)

## 23. **Skeleventy**

![Skeleventy 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/skeleventy-master-min.png)

A skeleton boilerplate built with Eleventy.

[See more details](https://github.com/josephdyer/skeleventy)

## 24. **Eleventy 2 Snipcart**

![Eleventy 2 Snipcart 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/snipcart-11ty-min.png)

A demo snipcart app built with 11ty.

[See more details](https://github.com/snipcart/11ty-demo-snipcart)

## 25. **Medium Export**

![Medium Export 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/medium-export-min.png)

A demo of generating a JAMstack site from an RSS feed.

[See more details](https://github.com/philhawksworth/medium-export)

## 26. **Eleventy NetlifyCMS Boilerplate**

![Eleventy NetlifyCMS Boilerplate 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/eleventy-netlify-boilerplate.png)

A boilerplate for building a simple website with the Eleventy static site generator.

[See more details](https://github.com/danurbanowicz/eleventy-netlify-boilerplate)

## 27. **Eleventy Base Blog**

![Eleventy Base Blog 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/eleventy-base-blog.png)

A starter repository for a blog web site using the Eleventy static site generator.

[See more details](https://github.com/11ty/eleventy-base-blog)

## 28. **Hawksworth**

![Hawksworth 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/hawksworx-11ty-min.png)

A blog site, powered by Eleventy and Netlify.

[See more details](https://github.com/philhawksworth/hawksworx.com)

## 29. **Eleventy About Me**

![Eleventy About Me 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/eleventy-about-me.png)

A personal website template, built with Eleventy.

[See more details](https://github.com/panos/eleventy-about-me)

## 30. Twelvety

![Twelvety 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/twelvety-min.png)

Twelvety is a pre-configured Eleventy starter project built to be fast. 

[See more details](https://github.com/gregives/twelvety) 

## 31. **11ty Contentful Gallery**

![11ty Contentful Gallery Theme](/images/uploads/contentful-gallery.png)

An example photo gallery made using Contentful and 11ty. 

[See more details](https://github.com/contentful/11ty-contentful-gallery)

## 32. **Eleventy React Starter**

![Eleventy React Starter](/images/uploads/eleventy-react-netlify.png)

Use React components in Eleventy!

[See more details](https://github.com/signalkuppe/eleventy-react)

## 33. **JAMStack Web Starter**

![JAMStack Web Starter](/images/uploads/jamstack-web-starter-min.png)

Static website workflow utilizing Eleventy, Tailwind CSS, Webpack and PostCSS.

[See more details](https://github.com/scottishstoater/jamstack-web-starter)

## 34. **Agility CMS Eleventy Starter**

![Agility CMS Eleventy Starter](/images/uploads/agilitycms-eleventy-starter.png)

A sample Eleventy starter that uses Agility CMS and aims to be a foundation for building fully static sites using 11ty and Agility CMS.

[See more details](https://github.com/agility/agilitycms-eleventy-starter-2020)

## 35. **11st Starter Kit**

![11st Starter Kit](/images/uploads/11st-starter-kit.png)

11ty, powered by Snowpack with Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js.

[See more details](https://github.com/stefanfrede/11st-starter-kit)

## 36. **XITY Starter**

![XITY Starter Theme](/images/uploads/xity-starter-min.png)

A blog-ready 11ty starter based on PostCSS, with RSS feed and Native Elements.

[See more details](https://github.com/equinusocio/xity-starter)

## 37. **pack11ty**

![pack11ty 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/pack11ty-min.png)

A heavily opinionated Eleventy template project!

[See more details](https://github.com/nhoizey/pack11ty)

## 38. **Eleventy Classic Blog Starter**

![Eleventy Classic Blog Starter Theme](/images/uploads/eleventy-classic-blog-starter.png)

A starter repository for a classic blog website using the Eleventy SSG.

[See more details](https://github.com/TigersWay/eleventy-classic-blog-starter)

## 39. **11ta Template**

![11ta Template](/images/uploads/11ta-template.png)

Deeply customizable, full-featured, ready to publish blog template built with 11ty, TailwindCSS, & Alpine.js.

[See more details](https://github.com/11ta/11ta-template)

## 40. JET

![JET 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/jet-min.png)

It‘s (j)ust (e)leventy and (t)ailwind … OK, and a few other things; it‘s still *really* small though.

[See more details](https://github.com/marcamos/jet)

## 41. **rocket11ty**

![rocket11ty 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/rocket11ty-min.png)

A simple halfmoon 11ty blog based on [eleventy-base-blog](https://github.com/11ty/eleventy-base-blog).

[See more details](https://github.com/aboutDavid/rocket11ty)

## 42. **11ty Netlify Jumpstart**

![11ty Netlify Jumpstart](/images/uploads/11ty-netlify-jumpstart.png)

Quickly launch an 11ty-generated static site. Includes a minimal Sass framework, and generated sitemap, RSS feed, and social share preview images.

[See more details](https://11ty-netlify-jumpstart.netlify.app/)

## 43. **Supermaya**

![Supermaya 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/supermaya-min.png)

Supermaya is an Eleventy starter kit designed to help you add rich features to a blog or website without the need for a complicated build process.

[See more details](https://github.com/madebymike/supermaya)

## 44. **Eleventy Webpack**

![Eleventy Webpack 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/eleventy-webpack-min.png)

A barebones Eleventy and Webpack boilerplate. 

[See more details](https://github.com/clenemt/eleventy-webpack)

## 45. **11tyby**

![11tyby Theme](/images/uploads/11tyby.png)

Simple 11ty setup using TypeScript, SASS, Preact with partial hydration, and other useful things. Aims to provide the DX of Gatsby, but using 11ty!

[See more details](https://github.com/jhukdev/11tyby)

## 46. **Eleventy Encore**

![Eleventy Encore 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/eleventy-encore.png)

Basic 11ty setup using webpack encore.

[See more details](https://github.com/disjfa/eleventy-encore)

## 47. **Twenty Ninety**

![Twenty Ninety 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/twenty-ninety-min.png)

A production-ready Eleventy starter kit, optimized for performance.

[See more details](https://github.com/seancdavis/twenty-ninety)

## 48. **Eleventy Solo Starter**

![Eleventy Solo Starter 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/eleventy-solo-starter-min.png)

A starter set for the Eleventy static site generator (SSG).

[See more details](https://github.com/brycewray/eleventy_solo_starter)

## 49. **Eleventy Site**

![Eleventy Site 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/eleventy-site-min.png)

A simple eleventy starter site.

[See more details](https://github.com/bjankord/eleventy-site)

## 50. **Elevenpack**

![Elevenpack 11ty Theme](/images/uploads/elevenpack.png)

Eleventy starter pack with modern JS and CSS workflows.

[See more details](https://github.com/deviousdodo/elevenpack)
title: 50 Best Eleventy Starter Themes [2021]
short: A roundup of the best 11ty starter templates.
